name: Pong UE4 Remaster
description:
Pong... Released in 1972, but never reached its true potential.

Now by utilising the power of UE4, it has been remastered and shows its true potential.  Still stands strong against even the top AAA titles released today.

First player to reach 30 points wins. Watch Pong evolve over time including all new power ups and a brand new custom made soundtrack.

-- Pong, its not over yet

  • Team Name : VIPRewinds
